apple_vendor_description: Apple's depiction of the couple with a heart, featuring a man and a person with medium-dark skin tone and no accompanying skin tone modifiers, radiates warmth and connection.  The figures are rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and gentle gradients, creating a tender and harmonious visual.  A stylized, glossy heart hovers between them, illuminated by realistic lighting, symbolizing love, deep affection, or a strong bond, making this emoji a beautiful representation of romance and partnership on Apple devices.
